Jasig Central Authentication Service Add-ons 0.8-SNAPSHOT API

Packages 
Package Description
net.unicon.cas.addons.authentication
Classes related to core CAS authentication.
net.unicon.cas.addons.authentication.handler
Classes related to authentication handler support
net.unicon.cas.addons.authentication.internal
Internal implementations of various strategies related to core authentication.
net.unicon.cas.addons.authentication.principal
Classes related to handling and resolving a Principal object.
net.unicon.cas.addons.authentication.principal.util
Utility classes dealing with various operations related to a Principal object.
net.unicon.cas.addons.authentication.strong
Classes dealing with strong authentication API, such as multifactor, etc.
net.unicon.cas.addons.authentication.strong.oath.totp
Classes providing support managing the Person Directory api.
net.unicon.cas.addons.authentication.support
Internal implementations of classes in support of CAS authentication.
net.unicon.cas.addons.client.validation
Classes providing support for addons related to the Java CAS client.
net.unicon.cas.addons.persondir
Classes providing support for dealing with the Person Directory api.
net.unicon.cas.addons.response
Classes providing different representations of the CAS protocol response payload, notably JSON.
net.unicon.cas.addons.serviceregistry
Classes extending the CAS Service Registry component to allow easier retrieval of extra attributes.
net.unicon.cas.addons.support
General purposes utility classes.
